lastfm.bio_content: Sedibus is a new moniker of electronic musician, DJ and producer Alex Paterson, best known as The Orb. Paterson released his first tracks under the Sedibus moniker in 2021. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
